description: ff. 131. 235 x 160; 200 x 125 mm. 34 lin. Maghribi. Ṣafar 1106. Gloss on al-Maḥallīʼs al-Badr al-ṭālīʻ: Brockelmann, GAL, II, 109 (commentary c, gloss α); S II, 105. Incip.: ... قال ... احمد الله على ما منح من الاهتداء
